page.title: 12ROYAL CHARTER MOELFRE 5
page.content: {Museum Proposal.}Moelfre Community Council are anxious to have a museum in Moelfre to display the artefacts from The Royal Charter. They have had meetings with Anglesey Borough Council about this. It will cost a lot to conserve the artefacts. The diving company is willing to give the artefacts to this museum. The Council has at present three places in mind that could be developed as a museum- the old Llanallgo school, Cocyn Uchaf, and the old lifeboat hut. In time we shall find out. Lia Jones.
